title: Sustainability - Kettering University
summary: The article emphasizes that true sustainability involves multiple, interrelated efforts to preserve and create resources such as water, air, and energy. It highlights the role of sustainable engineering in innovating products, processes, and providing necessary infrastructure while prioritizing resource conservation for future generations. The quotes from Dr. Gianfranco DiGiuseppe underscore the importance of energy development that meets current needs without jeopardizing future availability.

title: MoenÂ® Smart Sprinkler Controller Makes Outdoor Watering Routines Effortless, All From The Palm of Your Hand - PR Newswire
summary: Moen has introduced the Smart Sprinkler Controller and Smart Wireless Soil Sensors as part of its Smart Water Network, enabling users to manage home irrigation systems efficiently through a smartphone app. These innovations allow for customizable watering schedules and soil moisture monitoring, aiming to reduce water waste by adjusting watering in real-time based on environmental conditions. The technology can lead to a reduction of up to 30% in irrigation water use, saving homeowners significant amounts of water annually.

green_product: TRUE, as the Smart Sprinkler Controller and Soil Sensors are designed to minimize environmental impact by reducing resource consumption and promoting water conservation.

title: Brands turn to traditional Chinese culture to attract young customers - China Daily
summary: Daoxiangcun, a traditional Beijing snack brand, has launched new gift boxes featuring innovative snacks to attract younger customers while celebrating traditional Chinese culture. The brand recreates lost recipes and develops trendy products that resonate with modern tastes. The renovated store, Location Zero, offers a variety of authentic Beijing pastries with new twists.

title: TOTO Roars Back to Las Vegas for KBIS 2023 with Innovative New Residential and Commercial Products and a New ... - PR Newswire
summary: TOTO USA has unveiled its new NEOREST Smart Bidet Toilets that combine advanced technologies, elegant designs, and enhanced user comfort while promoting cleanliness and water conservation. The toilets feature innovative cleaning systems like EWATER+ and the TORNADO FLUSH system that reduce the need for harsh chemicals and optimize water usage. Additionally, TOTO emphasizes sustainable practices and aesthetics in their product line, showcasing a commitment to improving both consumer experience and environmental impact. The company has a century-long history of innovation in the bathroom fixture industry, contributing to luxury and sustainability.

title: Pure Harvest to build more indoor farms in Saudi Arabia - Verticalfarmdaily.com: global indoor farming news
summary: The National Agricultural Development Company (Nadec) has partnered with Pure Harvest Smart Farms to implement a sustainable food production project in Saudi Arabia, utilizing high-tech, climate-controlled systems to produce fresh fruits and vegetables year-round. This collaboration aims to enhance food security, conserve water, and reduce carbon emissions while supplying local markets with pesticide-free produce. The first project has already produced over 5 million kilograms of tomatoes annually with innovative farming methods, integrating renewable energy and aiming for future expansions. The partnership aligns with Saudi Vision 2030's goals for self-sufficiency and sustainability.
green_innovation: TRUE - This is green innovation because it significantly reduces environmental impacts through sustainable agricultural practices, minimizes resource consumption, and integrates renewable energy in food production.
business_innovation: TRUE - This is a business innovation because it involves a new partnership and improved agricultural processes that introduce advanced technology for year-round production of locally sourced produce.
green_product: TRUE - The fresh fruits and vegetables produced represent green products since they are grown sustainably, free of pesticides, and designed with minimal environmental impact throughout their lifecycle.
green_process: TRUE - The climate-controlled hybrid food production systems utilized in this project are green processes as they minimize environmental impacts, reduce water consumption, and optimize energy use through renewable resources.
company: National Agricultural Development Company (Nadec) and Pure Harvest Smart Farms

title: G.O.A.T Brand Labs Acquires Apparel Brand Imara - Indian Retailer
summary: Juicy Chemistry and Mommy Shots by Amrita launch the 'Scars are Beautiful' campaign for Women's Day, celebrating postpartum bodies and challenging societal perceptions of beauty. The campaign features mothers sharing their experiences, promoting self-love and body positivity by highlighting the beauty of scars from childbirth. Co-founder Megha Asher emphasizes the importance of celebrating women's unique journeys in motherhood, while Amrita Samant focuses on redefining beauty beyond perfection. The campaign aims to inspire women to embrace their bodies and honor their scars as symbols of strength and resilience.

business_innovation: TRUE, because it involves a unique marketing initiative that promotes a campaign aimed at changing societal views about postpartum bodies, representing a new approach to business in the beauty and wellness sector.
green_product: FALSE, because the article does not describe a specific good or service designed to significantly reduce environmental impact throughout its life cycle.
green_process: FALSE, because the article does not describe a method or technique in a business context that minimizes environmental impacts and promotes sustainability.
